mapper.sql: u.username as username, u.password as password, u.nick as nick, u.sex as sex, u.age as age, u.birthday as birthday, u.address as address, u.tel as tel, u.email as email, u.last_login_time as last_login_time, u.last_login_ip as last_login_ip, u.status as status, u.create_user as create_user, u.create_time as create_time, u.update_user as update_user, u.update_time as update_time
mapper.insert: insert into user ( username, password, nick, sex, age, birthday, address, tel, email, last_login_time, last_login_ip, status, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time ) values ( #{username}, #{password}, #{nick}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{birthday}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{lastLoginIp}, #{status}, #{createUser}, now(), #{updateUser}, now() )

select
from user u where u.username = #{username} and u.status = 1
